description: This workflow is designed to build data-driven building energy models based on the data stored locally

agent_nodes.system_message: Limited by space, the detailed system message can be found in the agent library: https://github.com/lz356/building_llm_agent_library/tree/main/LLM_agentic_workflows/data_driven_building_energy_modeling

tools.description: this tool can take in Python code as string and execute the code, which is a built-in function called PythonREPL from LangChain
